attributes.action: Special needs nursery provision: full time not part time!
attributes.additional_details:
Staffordshire County Council are proposing to abolish full time nursery places for children with Special Educational Needs aged 2 and 3, Parents rely on this provision as private daycare nurseries do not have the expertise or resources to meet the needs of these children.
We would like the government to step in and support  full time provision for special needs children, ensuring parents maintain the same rights as those of none disabled children.
